title: IC3 : total damage caused by reported cyber crime 2001 to 2018
yAxis: Total damage in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total damage in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 17 data points.
Overall Total damage in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Total damage in million U.S. dollars is rapidly increasing from 2001 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, roughly increasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2017, and finally roughly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Total damage in million U.S. dollars, about 2710.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Total damage in million U.S. dollars about 17.8 was reached at Year 2001

The line significantly increased by 36.2 from Year 2001 to 2002,increased by 71.6 from Year 2002 to 2003,increased by 115.0 from Year 2004 to 2005,increased by 295.1 from Year 2008 to 2009, and lastly, increased by 1291.3 from Year 2017 to 2018.
